ComicInfo.Title: The Mystery of the Midnight Stalker
ComicInfo.Summary:
Professor Xavier allows the X-Men to travel to Antarctica, enter the Savage Land, and investigate the noble yet wild, KA-ZAR!
This issue contains 3 stories. The first story is titled "The Coming of Ka-Zar!" and is a reprint of X-Men #10, the second story is an original story called "In His Footsteps, the Huntsman of Zeus!" starring Hercules, the third story is also a reprint, entitled "The Mystery of the Mid-Night Stalker!" which was originally presented in Daredevil #24.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-11-30 22:21:23. [CVDB10957]
ComicInfo.Penciller: Gene Colan, Jack Kirby, Marie Severin
ComicInfo.Inker: Chic Stone, Frank Giacoia, Gene Colan, Jack Kirby
ComicInfo.Characters: Angel, Ares, Beast, Black Panther, Cyclops, Daredevil, Hawkeye, Hebe, Hercules, Huntsman of Zeus, Iceman, Jean Grey, Ka-Zar, Maa-Gor, Parnival Plunder, Professor X, Quicksilver, Scarlet Witch, Shadow-Hound, Vision, Zabu, Zeus
ComicInfo.Teams: Avengers, Dinosaurs, Gods of Olympus, Man-Apes , Swamp Men, X-Men
ComicInfo.Locations: Antarctica, Avengers Mansion, Danger Room, England, Europe, London, New York City, New York State, Plunder Castle, Savage Land, Xavier Institute
